index_get_cleaning_service: Get Airbnb Cleaneing Service or Manage Your Own Cleaning Team -
index_download_app_description: Quickly download the app and create your account in seconds. No complicated registrations or lengthy forms—just simple, fast onboarding.
index_connect_your_team_description: Automatically sync your contacts or manually add friends. Our intelligent network helps you connect seamlessly across multiple platforms.
index_find_cleaners_description: Start chatting, make video calls, and share files instantly. Experience real-time communication with crystal-clear quality and ultimate privacy.
index_find_manage_cleaners_desc:
Lightning-fast communication across devices.
Send messages, photos, and files instantly with real-time delivery and read receipts.
index_cleaning_video_reports_desc:
Crystal-clear video connections worldwide.
High-definition video calls with noise cancellation and seamless group video support.
index_turnover_scheduling_desc:
Uncompromising privacy and security.
Military-grade encryption protects every message and call, ensuring your conversations remain completely private.
index_lost_item_damage_alerts_desc:
Seamless experience across all devices.
Synchronize conversations and media between smartphones, tablets, and desktops without missing a beat.
index_what_clients_sharing: What our clients sharing about us!
index_trusted_by_companies: Trusted by over most popular companies worldwide
page_about_description: In 2014, Steven Smith have gotten so much of our time back that we're now able to put towards things that are actually helping our company as opposed to just throwing content out there. and the idea of Lexend was born. Today, Lexend empowers teams to easily communicate with customers through personalized documents that can be created in minutes, build meaningful relationships.
page_about_how_helps_desc1: Teams use Lexend to improve document workflows, insights, and speed while delivering an amazing experience for their customers. Businesses trust Lexend's all-in-one document automation software to streamline the process to create, approve, and eSign proposals, quotes, contracts, and more. With powerful document creation and workflow capabilities, teams can provide their customers with a more professional, timely, and engaging experience.
page_about_how_helps_desc2: In 2014, Steven Smith have gotten so much of our time back that we're now able to put towards things that are actually helping our company as opposed to just throwing content out there. and the idea of Lexend was born. Today, Lexend empowers teams to easily communicate with customers through personalized documents that can be created in minutes, build meaningful relationships..
page_about_make_an_impact_desc: We're building something big. Something that has the power to change the trajectory of any sized business for the better.
page_about_learn_desc: Lexend team are masters of their craft. Even though we're all experts in our respective fields, we always make time to expand our minds.
page_about_have_fun_desc: We work hard and play harder. We believe in the importance of celebrating wins big or small, for the business or individuals.
page_about_empathy_desc: We strive to be empathetic to every customer and colleague and by doing so we can provide a better experience for all.
page_about_looking_for_people: We're looking for people who share our vision!
page_about_have_what_it_takes: Have what it takes to be one of us.
page_career_detail_description: A Senior Product Designer is a creative and technical professional dedicated to designing the aesthetics, functionality, and usability of a product, ensuring it delivers an exceptional user experience and aligns with the company's goals.
page_career_detail_task_1: Create end-to-end experiences, from start to finish.
page_career_detail_task_2: Collaborate with Product Managers, UXR and UXW to define design solutions.
page_career_detail_task_3: Create and deliver high-quality user interfaces that help improve the overall design language of our products.
page_career_detail_task_4: Have a 360o view of the area you're working on and the business in general.
page_career_detail_task_5: Collaborate, assist and review junior designers.
page_career_detail_task_6: Lead and participate in brainstorming sessions.
page_career_detail_task_7: Present design projects to stakeholders and gather feedback.
page_career_detail_task_8: Develop exhaustive design handoffs, and follow design implementations with developers.
page_career_detail_task_10: Actively build and maintain internal design systems.
page_career_detail_task_11: Suggest improvements that contribute to the overall direction of our products and strategy.
page_career_detail_task_12: Participate in shaping the design culture at YASSIR.
page_career_detail_task_13: Help maintain and improve the internal design process.
page_career_detail_req_1: A computer science graduate, relevant degree, or equivalent.
page_career_detail_req_2: 5+ years of experience designing digital experiences, in a professional environment.
page_career_detail_req_3: Portfolio showcasing your work and great visual skills and attention to detail.
page_career_detail_req_4: Experience designing web and mobile apps.
page_career_detail_req_5: Ability to dissect and simplify complex problems.
page_career_detail_req_6: High understanding of iOS and Android design language and system behavior and platform standards in general.
page_career_detail_req_7: Advanced design tools mastery, such as Sketch or Figma.
page_career_detail_req_10: Strong knowledge of the product development process.
page_career_detail_req_11: Always up to date with design industry news and best practices.
page_career_detail_req_13: Great written and verbal communication skills.
page_career_detail_req_14: Team player, you enjoy working in teams and sharing your experience and knowledge with others.
page_career_detail_req_15: Ability and willingness to learn and develop strong design leadership skills.
page_career_detail_req_16: Experience working and building Design Systems.
page_career_intro_text: We are looking for people that share our vision. Are you adaptable, driven, and friendly? Do you thrive in a fast-paced work environment where collaboration is the norm? If the answer is yes, then you're a what we looking for.
page_career_benefits_intro: We love our people and want to ensure that they are supported at work and at home. That's what helps us maintain our coveted best work-life balance award. Here are just some of the perks you can expect to receive while working for us:
page_contact_feel_free_to_reach_out: Feel free to reach out to us using the options below, and our dedicated team will respond to your inquiries promptly.
page_contact_testimonial_text: This software simplifies the website building process, making it a breeze to manage our online presence.
page_contact_have_question_feedback: Have a question or feedback? Fill out the form below, and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
page_contact_or_drop_us_message: Or drop us a message via
page_contact_need_to_know_code: Do I need to know about how to code?
page_contact_need_to_know_code_answer: Yes, you need to have a fair amount of knowledge in dealing with HTML/CSS as well as JavaScript in order to be able to use Lexend.
page_contact_commercial_projects: Can I use it for commercial projects?
page_contact_commercial_projects_answer: Feel free to do so. Lexend does exist to evolve every commercial project. You can also use it to build stunning websites for your own clients (we won't breathe a word).
page_contact_multiple_projects: Can I use it for multiple projects?
page_contact_multiple_projects_answer: Definitely! Please use it however you like; we don't limit it.
page_contact_create_sell_product: Can I use this to create and sell a product?
page_contact_create_sell_product_answer: Do not ever consider doing it.
page_contact_refund_policy_answer: We understand the importance of customer satisfaction and we strive to provide the best products and services. However, please note that due to the nature of our products and services, we do not offer refunds after a purchase has been made.
page_features_focus_helping_description: We focus on helping you to make useful content more accessible with an utlimate goal for a good sharing profit as a content creator.
page_features_share_tools_quickly_title: Share tools quickly and confidently in minutes
page_features_share_tools_quickly_descri: This powerfull tool eliminates the need to leave Salesforce to get things done as I can create a custom proposal with dynamic pricing tables. You can also customize your own dynamic versions.
page_features_connect_entire_business_ti: Connect every part of your entire business
page_features_connect_entire_business_de: Keep data consistent, with native CRM integrations that streamline your entire Tool workflow.
page_features_maintain_compliance_title: Maintain compliance and control your apps
page_features_maintain_compliance_descri: Improve security and trust with built-in legally binding e-Signatures. Create pre-approved templates, content blocks and lock all legal information to prevent costly mistakes.
page_features_review_quickly_description: Get real-time access to approvals, comments and version tracking. Smart features like variables and conditional logic help you eliminate Tool errors.
page_features_review_confidently_using_l: Review quickly and confidently using Lexend.
page_features_proposals_description: Share Tools in minutes with pre-built, customizable templates.
page_features_quotes_description: Find out in real time when they're opened, viewed and signed.
page_features_contracts_description: Use our native CRM integrations to pull customer data into your Tools fast.
page_features_esignatures_description: Keep your data secure with our legally-binding e-Signature software.
page_features_forms_description: Share via direct link or by embedding them on your website, no coding necessary.
page_features_payments_description: Collect them instantly right from your contract, while increasing your close rate by 36%.

title: LodgeMatic - Smart Short-term Rental Management
description: AI-powered platform for efficient short-term rental and cleaning management.
og_description: AI-powered platform for efficient short-term rental and cleaning management.
exampletwo: Thank you for understanding and patience!
powered_by: Powered by AI, built for better short-term rentals.
gdpr-desc: We use cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website. By continuing to use our site, you accept our use of cookies,
header_powerful_app_title: A Powerful App to Manage All Airbnb Operations
header_powerful_app_desc: Features include smart scheduling, a built-in PMS, and a trusted cleaning marketplace
header_assign_tasks_desc: Assign tasks, share files, and communicate with your team.
header_verified_professionals_desc: Assign tasks, share files, and communicate with your team.
header_turnover_automation_desc: Streamlines turnovers for platform cleaners or your own staff.
header_turnover_guidance_desc: Computer vision detects layout mistakes & cleaning issues.
header_damage_detection_desc: Flags missing items and damage post-checkout.
header_realtime_property_manual_desc: Auto-generates room manuals from video + chat
header_individual_hosts_desc: Find cleaners and let AI inspect cleaning & lost items.
header_property_managers_desc: Streamline turnovers and monitor property condition at scale
header_software_developers_desc: Bring the full power of LodgeMatic into your product via API.
header_pms_integrations_desc: We're actively building integrations with leading Property Management Systems (PMS) to make your operations even more streamlined.
header_start_working_desc: A platform that helps cleaners get jobs, track tasks, and grow their reputation.
header_landing_page_builder_desc: Deliver the right message to the right user
header_ai_powered_tools_desc: Say hello to your AI growth assistant
header_running_vacation_rental: Running a vacation rental is no longer a hassle
header_running_vacation_rental_desc: Managing multiple tasks with AI automation.
header_help_center_desc: FAQs and guides to get the most out of LodgeMatic.
header_blog_desc: Insights on turnover automation, AI tools, and market trends.
header_integrations_coming_soon_desc: Sync with PMS tools like Guesty, Hostaway and more.
header_partner_with_us_desc: Looking to collaborate with LodgeMatic? Let's talk.
header_for_developers_coming_soon_desc: Access our API and build smart tools.
